title: Wreckage
description: While investigating the rape and murder of a 22-year-old woman in Texas, detectives uncover a trail of sexual assault crimes pointing to a repeat offender. Josh Mankiewicz reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
